statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_access_control;
SELECT username, role FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE role='admin';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE role='guest' AND access_level < 10;
SELECT MAX(access_level) FROM smart_home_access_control;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE role='admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT username, access_level FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY access_level ASC
SELECT user_id, username FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE role='guest' AND access_level < 5
SELECT * FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE access_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, role, access_level FROM smart_home_access_control WHERE role='admin' OR access_level > 5 ORDER BY access_level DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '1';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type LIKE '%read%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT name, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, name, role FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT user_id, name, role FROM users WHERE role='user' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role=roles.role_name JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id=permissions.role_id;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.role=permissions.role_id WHERE permission_name='read';
SELECT * FROM Roles;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE role_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT device_name FROM Devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, action_type FROM AccessLogs GROUP BY action_type;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_time FROM AccessLogs WHERE action_type = 'login' ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, password FROM Users WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM Devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, d.device_name FROM Users u JOIN Roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id JOIN Devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id;
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE action_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe' AND role_id = 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id
SELECT user_id, username, role_name, role_id FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, r.role_name, r.role_id FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.user_id DESC

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id
